name: Play Football 2019 - Real Goal
description:
Play Football 2019 is equipped with latest soccer AI moves. Arena is designed with HD graphics and enthusiastic crowd. Enjoy the ultimate 11 player soccer simulation.

Football 2019 fever is high. Do you love football? Download this game and practice your skills.


======
Controls
======
-Smart joystick control to move player
-Sprint control to boost up running speed
-Kick control to make a powerful kick
-Pass control to pass the ball to friendly player
-Tackle control to snatch ball from opponent player


=========
Game Modes
=========
-Quick Match: Select your team from world’s top teams and start match
-Tournament: Its a knock out mode. You have to win the match to qualify for next round and make your place in FINAL match

=======
Stadiums
=======
-There are three different stadiums in the game
-Select your favorite stadium and enjoy the game

==========
Social Features
==========
-Share your score with friends on Facebook
-Invite friends to play game


=======
Feedback
=======
If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at techmowo@gmail.com. In case something is not working correctly please let us know, I’ll be glad to fix that.
Please post comments and feedback. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.
